top_stories.title: The best AI-powered dictation apps of 2025
top_stories.description: AI-powered dictation apps are useful for replying to emails, taking notes, and even coding through your voice
top_stories.author: Ivan Mehta
top_stories.content: AI-powered dictation apps are useful for replying to emails, taking notes, and even coding through your voice

top_stories.title: Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for resilience
top_stories.description: As enterprises accelerate their move toward autonomous workflows powered by artificial intelligence, the urgent need for robust AI agent governance has become a critical operational mandate. An agent’s potential relies on the fact that they can perform higher-level tasks, including assuming identities and executing business processes. But if that is compromised, attackers have effectively hijacked […] The post Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for...

top_stories.content: As enterprises accelerate their move toward autonomous workflows powered by artificial intelligence, the urgent need for robust AI agent governance has become a critical operational mandate. top_stories.title: John Carreyrou and other authors bring new lawsuit against six major AI companies
top_stories.description: These authors rejected Anthropic's class action settlement, arguing that "LLM companies should not be able to so easily extinguish thousands upon thousands of high-value claims at bargain-basement rates."
top_stories.author: Amanda Silberling
top_stories.content: These authors rejected Anthropic's class action settlement, arguing that "LLM companies should not be able to so easily extinguish thousands upon thousands of high-value claims at bargain-basement rates."

top_stories.title: A Coding Implementation of an OpenAI-Assisted Privacy-Preserving Federated Fraud Detection System from Scratch Using Lightweight PyTorch Simulations
top_stories.description: In this tutorial, we demonstrate how we simulate a privacy-preserving fraud detection system using Federated Learning without relying on heavyweight frameworks or complex infrastructure. We build a clean, CPU-friendly setup that mimics ten independent banks, each training a local fraud-detection model on its own highly imbalanced transaction data. We coordinate these local updates through a […] The post A Coding Implementation of an OpenAI-Assisted Privacy-Preserving Federated Fraud Detection...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: In this tutorial, we demonstrate how we simulate a privacy-preserving fraud detection system using Federated Learning without relying on heavyweight frameworks or complex infrastructure. We build a clean, CPU-friendly setup that mimics ten independent banks, each training a local fraud-detection model on its own highly imbalanced transaction data. top_stories.title: Why the operating room is ripe for AI, according to Akara
top_stories.description: There’s plenty of hype around AI and robots in healthcare, but the problem that’s actually costing hospitals money right now is operating room coordination. Two to four hours of OR time is lost every single day, not because of the surgeries themselves, but because of everything in between, from manual scheduling and coordination chaos to […]
